thread.title: Kenya: Aviation Union to Go on Strike
thread.title_full: Kenya: Aviation Union to Go on Strike

title: Kenya: Aviation Union to Go on Strike
text:
Rwanda: Earthquake Hits Rwanda By Joseph Ndunda 
Nairobi The Kenya Aviation Workers' Union yesterday issued a seven-day strike notice over delayed 10 per cent salary increase. 
"The issue is refusal by the Kenya Civil Aviation Authority to sign a negotiated and concluded collective bargaining agreement," the notice states. 
The pay rise was to be backdated to June 2013. 
KAWU secretary general Moss Ndiema said their more than 7,000 members will not work from August 12. Kenya
